overview: Diana Prince arrives home to a slacking pool boy. Lucky for him, she might let him off a little too easy. When the repo man comes to take Kelly Leigh's things she puts an offer on the table that is hard to refuse, her pussy.  Peyton Leigh is a little fed up with her husband's cocky assistant and decides to show him who he really works for. Dance instructor Raylene has a very tense student. She's hoping he might loosen up a little after he shoots a load. Fed up with her husband always cheating, Sienna West has a little trick up her sleeve. With the help of a young stud, she plans on getting even.
title: Cougar's Prey 4
